document_data.name: The Shop of Faded Carpets
document_data.mainbody: The '''Shop of Faded Carpets''' was found in the city of [[Kadarasto]], owned and operated by [[Cholk min Kado]] in [[1367 DR]].{{AQ-time}}
document_data.Description: This humble shop sold ancient [[rug]]s, [[carpet]]s, and [[tapestries]].
document_data.Rumors & Legends:
The Shop of Faded Carpets was a front for a massive spy network carefully orchestrated by Cholk. His contacts with over 200 local beggars were able to reach anyone in practically any location within the city.

The shop was also used to sell [[magic item]]s looted from nearby ruins and to smuggle illegal goods out of Kadarasto.
